comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract includes one or more amendments..This contract is a multi-year contract. The consultant to provide a shop inspection (review and inspection of materials, fit up, alignment and welds in accordance with applicable codes, specifications and drawings) and field inspection (review and inspection of member placement, alignment, bolted connections, joist bearings, joist welds, metal decking and welds in accordance with the applicable codes, specifications and drawings) at the Port Hope Water Treatment Plant Building.
